title: Average daily television viewing time in France 2005 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Time in hours and minutes (hh.mm), with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2012 to 2008.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2015.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2012.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2008 to 2005.
gold: This statistic shows the average time individuals spent watching television per day in France from 2005 to 2018 . The data refers to television owners in metropolitan France aged four years and older . In 2018 , the average daily television viewing time in France came to three hours and 36 minutes , six minute less than one year earlier and a continuous slight decrease since 2015 .
